borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Submission of details of automatic opening and closing mechanism on the internal set of lobby entrance doors pursuant to condition 19; detailed drawings at a scale of not less than 1:20 in plan, section and elevation and physical samples, including colours and finishes, of the external materials) of the roof terrace at first floor level (including means of enclosure, decking and jumbrellas) pursuant to condition 21; detailed drawings at a scale of not less than 1:20 in plan, section and elevation and physical samples, including paint colours) of the materials of the proposed single glazed external timber windows and doors pursuant to condition 22; detailed drawings at a scale of not less than 1:20 in plan, section and elevation and physical samples of external materials, including colours and finishes) of the external canopy to the front elevation pursuant to condition 24 of planning permission ref: 2023/01867/FUL granted 8th March 2024.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
